meanings.definition: A type of tree with broad leaves and a tall trunk.
meanings.sent1: The park was filled with beautiful elms.
meanings.sent2: I love the shade provided by the elms in our backyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played hide-and-seek among the elms.
meanings.sent4: The elms stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The rustling of the elms in the wind was a soothing lullaby.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'elm', referring to multiple trees of this type.
meanings.sent1: We sat under the shade of the old elms in the village square.
meanings.sent2: The street was lined with majestic elms, creating a picturesque scene.
meanings.sent3: The children loved to climb the elms and pretend they were kings of the forest.
meanings.sent4: The elms whispered secrets to each other in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the elms in full bloom was a sight to behold.
